title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; stream or block generation, pull/manage models, embeddings, list running models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; generate, chat, embed and pull models with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose examples for running Ollama server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat, embeddings and model management; targets .NET 6+.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; shows ingestion and Q&A pipeline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel chat, code review summaries and custom slash commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with session memory, model selector and file upload for RAG experiments.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to Ollama’s REST API for Node, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package exposing sync and async Python clients for chatting, generating and embedding with Ollama.
